title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary 
Increase of Official Controls and Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and 
Feed of Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) (No.2) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (temporary increase official control emergency measure import food feed non-animal origin) (amendment) (no.2) regulation 2022

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 9 of 2020) are amended— 

(a) 

in Regulation 2, by substituting for paragraph (2) (as inserted by 
the European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls 
and Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal 
Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 237 of 2020) 
the following– 

“(2) 

These Regulations do not apply to– 

(a) 

consignments of products, unless their net weight 
exceeds 5 kg of fresh products or 2 kg of other 
products which are: 

(i) 

consignments which form part of passengers’ 
personal luggage and are intended for personal 
consumption or use; 

(ii) non-commercial consignments sent to natural 
persons, which are not intended to be placed 
on the market, 

(b) 

consignments of products, unless their net weight 
exceeds 50 kg of fresh products or 10 kg of other 
products which are: 

(i) 

consignments sent as trade samples, laboratory 
samples or as display items for exhibitions, 
which are not intended to be placed on the 
market; 

(ii) 

consignments intended for scientific purposes, 
and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th November, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [572] 3 

(c) 

food and feed referred to in points (a) and (b) of 
Article 1(1) of Regulation 2019/1793 on board 
means of transport operating internationally, which 
are not unloaded and are intended for consumption 
by the crew and passengers.”, and 

(b) 

in Regulation 3(1), by substituting for the definition of 
“Regulation 2019/1793” the following – 

“‘Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 2019 as amended by 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 
2020, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/1540 of 
22 October 2020, Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2021/608 of 14 April 2021, Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1900 of 27 October 2021, Commission 
Implementing Regulation (EU) 2021/2246 of 15 December 2021 
and Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2022/913 of 30 
May 2022;”.

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: 3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
3. The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Emergency Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No.241 of 2022) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 November, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [572]

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972), for the purpose of giving effect to
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations update existing Regulations with regard to additional levels 
of controls on the import of certain food of non-animal origin from specific 
third countries with regard to pesticide residues and on the import of certain 
feed of non-animal origin from specific third countries 

 
 
 
 
 
 [572] 5
